verses.verse: This<WG5124> know<WG1097> also,<WG1161> that in the last<WG2078> days<WG2250> perilous<WG5467> times<WG5550> shall come.<WG1764>

For men<WG444> shall be lovers<WG5367> of their own selves,<WG5367> covetous,<WG5366> boasters,<WG213> proud,<WG5244> blasphemers,<WG989> disobedient<WG545> to parents,<WG1118> unthankful,<WG884> unholy,<WG462>
Without<WG794> natural affection,<WG794> truce breakers,<WG786> false<WG1228> accusers,<WG1228> incontinent,<WG193> fierce,<WG434> despisers<WG865> of those that are good,<WG865>
Traitors,<WG4273> heady,<WG4312> high minded,<WG5187> lovers<WG5369> of pleasures<WG5369> more<WG3123> than<WG2228> lovers<WG5377> of God;<WG5377>
Having<WG2192> a form<WG3446> of godliness,<WG2150> but denying<WG720> the power<WG1411> thereof:<WG846> from such<WG5128> turn<WG665> away.<WG665>

For of this<WG5130> sort are they which creep<WG1744> <WG1519> into<WG1519> houses,<WG3614> and lead<WG162> captive<WG162> silly<WG1133> women<WG1133> laden<WG4987> with sins,<WG266> led<WG71> away with divers<WG4164> lusts,<WG1939>
Ever<WG3842> learning,<WG3129> and never<WG3368> able<WG1410> to come<WG2064> to the knowledge<WG1922> of the truth.<WG225>

Now<WG1161> as Jannes<WG2389> and Jambres<WG2387> withstood<WG436> Moses,<WG3475> so<WG3779> do these<WG3778> also<WG2532> resist<WG436> the truth:<WG225> men<WG444> of corrupt<WG2704> minds,<WG3563> reprobate<WG96> concerning<WG4012> the faith.<WG4102>
But they shall proceed<WG4298> no<WG3756> further:<WG1909> <WG4118> for their folly<WG454> shall be manifest<WG1552> to all<WG3956> men, as their's<WG3588> <WG1565> also<WG2532> was.
But you have fully<WG3877> known<WG3877> my doctrine,<WG1319> manner<WG72> of life,<WG72> purpose,<WG4286> faith,<WG4102> long-suffering,<WG3115> charity,<WG26> patience,<WG5281>

Persecutions,<WG1375> afflictions,<WG3804> which<WG3634> came<WG1096> to me at<WG1722> Antioch,<WG490> at<WG1722> Iconium,<WG2430> at<WG1722> Lystra;<WG3082> what<WG3634> persecutions<WG1375> I endured:<WG5297> but out of them all<WG3956> the Lord<WG2962> delivered<WG4506> me.
Yes,<WG1161> and all<WG3956> that will<WG2309> live<WG2198> godly<WG2153> in Christ<WG5547> Jesus<WG2424> shall suffer<WG1377> persecution.<WG1377>
But evil<WG4190> men<WG444> and seducers<WG1114> shall wax<WG4298> worse<WG5501> and worse,<WG5501> deceiving,<WG4105> and being deceived.<WG4105>
But continue<WG3306> you in the things which<WG3739> you have learned<WG3129> and have been assured<WG4104> of, knowing<WG1492> of whom<WG5101> you have learned<WG3129> them;

And that from a child<WG1025> you have known<WG1492> the holy<WG2413> scriptures,<WG1121> which<WG3588> are able<WG1410> to make<WG4679> you wise<WG4679> to salvation<WG4991> through<WG1223> faith<WG4102> which<WG3588> is in Christ<WG5547> Jesus.<WG2424>

All<WG3956> scripture<WG1124> is given by inspiration<WG2315> of God,<WG2315> and is profitable<WG5624> for doctrine,<WG1319> for reproof,<WG1650> for correction,<WG1882> for instruction<WG3809> in righteousness:<WG1343>
That the man<WG444> of God<WG2316> may be perfect,<WG739> thoroughly<WG1822> furnished<WG1822> to all<WG3956> good<WG18> works.<WG2041>
